title: Problem / Bug with Remake

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
This game was just remade because we invaded at 1:08 and got a double kill. The Jinx who didnt die in the invade afk'ed and the game was remade.

Not only did those 2 kills happen, we re-invaded at 2 minutes and got another kill on their jungle

AND

I got a solo kill on Zed in mid at 2:50

AND

Our top got a solo kill at the same time


5 Kills

but because Jinx went afk after the double we remake


Oh and we know Jinx wasnt actually afk because after they remade she said "I got you fam"

replies.body: It is possible she was AFK for the time needed (the first 3 minutes while the deaths occurred) and managed to reconnect just as the vote had been cast and counted. She would have seen they were already at a disadvantage and despite her reconnecting the vote would have already passed.
